bonkers_models.description: Bonkers Advance is a powerful AI text-to-image model that generates text in images along with realistic human features and more prompt following.
bonkers_models.name: Bonkers Advance
bonkers_models.pseudoDescription: Bonkers Advance is an AI image model that can create visual content from text, and is designed to address challenges in text rendering and realistic human features

bonkers_models.description: Imagen 4 is Google DeepMind's most advanced image generation model, designed for bringing creative visions to life. It excels at photorealism, fine detail rendering, and accurate text generation.
bonkers_models.name: Imagen 4
bonkers_models.pseudoDescription: Google DeepMind's flagship model for photorealistic, sharp, and text-accurate images.
